info: A community is nothing without its people, and therefore, we welcomed in the Freshmen at a small orientation Session about DSC wherein we told them about the Club, our vision and the end mission.

Cloud is one of the most vital technologies in the world of development and this is what makes this event so vital. We had several speakers talk to us about GCP, its scope, use cases and the amazing world of cloud computing.
An exciting event about technologies which is the bee's knees today! The audience interacted with the Speakers and learnt Cool Stuff.
TensorFlow 2.0 has arrived, with a focus on ease of use, developer productivity, and scalable, production-ready machine learning workloads. And what a party it was!
Google DSC Solutions Challenge is a worldwide Program that calls for Developers from all over the world to put their best feet forward in solving a Problem with a Social cause.
The Inaugural Session of DSC HIT that saw the culmination of months of preparation as the Students got an idea of what DSC does.
Livestreaming of the DSC India Summit 2019 along with other fun activities.
Brace yourselves for the Android Study Jam. We've scheduled back to back sessions on Android, AndroidX, Firebase.

Machine Learning has been the industry buzzword for years now. With the rise in the number of AI startups and billions of dollars being invested in them, there couldnâ€™t be a better time to learn this impressive and employable skill. But where to start?
Mozilla Launch Party is a one-day tech conference event to motivate developers and designers to contribute more to open-source projects and forthcoming technologies.
DSC HIT along with Google Developers and Qwiklabs brings to you the #GCPCrashCourse, the best place to get started with the Google Cloud Platform.
Explore ML is a Google-sponsored program for university students to get started with Machine Learning. The curriculum offers 3 tracks of Machine Learning Content (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced).
